item.description:
Enneagram Advanced Workshop

Learn about all the advanced levels of the Enneagram - instinctual subtypes and subtype stacking, wings, stress and secure points, centers, tritypes, type sequence, parental types, and all the subtleties of the Enneagram beyond just the basics!

2-6pm

$50 or $75 for both beginning and advanced workshops


Learn from the master who has been teaching the Enneagram for 22 years. Author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, both available at the workshop.

at The Arlington Center
Arlington MA
arlingtoncenter.org

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Next to Dunkin Donuts just past Arlington Center and just before Walgreens
item.name: Enneagram Advanced Workshop
